pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantile Regression for Binary Longitudinal Data // Implements the Bayesian quantile regression model for binary longitudinal data (QBLD) developed in Rahman and Vossmeyer (2019) DOI:10.1108/S0731-90532019000040B009. The model handles both fixed and random effects and implements both a blocked and an unblocked Gibbs sampler for posterior inference.
